title: Grocery market share in France 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share of total grocers for 10 number of Grocery Storess.
The Market share of total grocers is appeared to be the highest at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and lowest at Grocery Stores Other.
There is a difference of 20.9 between the maximum Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and minimum Grocery Stores Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share of total grocers for 10 number of Grocery Storess.
The Market share of total grocers is highest at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and lowest at Grocery Stores Other.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share of total grocers for 10 number of Grocery Storess.
The Market share of total grocers is appeared to be the highest at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and lowest at Grocery Stores Other.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Grocery Stores, and Market share of total grocers in each Grocery Stores on the y axis.
The Market share of total grocers is highest at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and lowest at Grocery Stores Other.
Second maximum Market share of total grocers is found at Grocery Stores .
There is a difference of 20.9 between the maximum Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and minimum Grocery Stores Other.
Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group is higher than any other Grocery Storess with value 21.6, followed by , and Intermarché Group. Down to Grocery Stores Other with the lowest value 0.7.
The lowest value 0.7 at Other is almost 2.16 times smaller than the average value 10.0.
The Market share of total grocers is 100.0 if we add up values of all Grocery Storess.
